name: Shooty Mine
description: Shooty Mine is a third person competitive multiplayer shooter set in outer-space. Create or join hosted games with team death match, capture point or a combination of both game modes. Compete in a 1v1, 2v2, 3v2, etc! Low gravity and a jet pack creates a fun and unique character movement system. Multiple levels use procedural generation to provide a different experience each time. Most environments are destructible creating a changing landscape as the match progresses.
